TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class HelpProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class HelpProvider : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider
type HelpProvider = class inherit Component interface IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 为控件提供弹出帮助或联机帮助。

span.span: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个实例都 维护一个集合，其中包含对关联控件的引用。Each instance of maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it. 若要将帮助文件与相关联 ，请设置 属性。To associate a Help file with the , set the property. 您可以通过调用 方法并为指定控件提供值来指定提供的帮助的类型 。You specify the type of Help provided by calling the method and providing a value for the specified control. 可以通过调用方法为帮助提供关键字或主题 。You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the method. 若要将帮助打开到特定主题，应以 *topicName*格式传递关键字。To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm. 若要将特定帮助字符串与控件相关联，请使用 方法。To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the method. 当控件具有焦点时，如果用户按 F1 键，则使用此方法与控件相关联的字符串将显示在弹出窗口中。The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus. 如果 尚未设置属性，则必须使用 方法来提供帮助文本。If the property has not been set, you must use the method to provide the Help text. 如果同时设置了 和帮助字符串，则基于的帮助 将优先。If you have set both and the Help string, Help based on the will take precedence. 调用类的方法 以提供帮助功能。 calls methods on the class to provide Help functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示区分上下文的帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用 方法来设置帮助工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当你使用上下文相关的 "帮助" 按钮并单击 "地址" 字段上的 "帮助" 光标时，"帮助" 工具提示会显示指定的文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 当你在地址字段中按下 F1 键时，将显示 mspaint.exe 帮助文件，因为该 属性已设置为 mspaint.exe。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to mspaint.chm. 为 每个地址控件调用方法，以确定它具有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HelpProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建类的实例后 ，请使用 属性、 方法和 方法将帮助主题与控件相关联。Once you have created an instance of the class, use the property, method, and method to associate your Help topics with a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示区分上下文的帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用 方法来设置帮助工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当你使用上下文相关的 "帮助" 按钮并单击 "地址" 字段上的 "帮助" 光标时，"帮助" 工具提示会显示指定的文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 当你按下 "地址" 字段中的 "F1" 键时，将显示 mspaint.exe 帮助文件，因为该 属性已设置为 `mspaint.chm` 。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 为 每个地址控件调用方法，以确定它具有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在运行时显示此帮助字符串，用户在指定控件具有输入焦点的情况下按 F1 键。To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 类筛选输入。The following code example shows how to use the and classes to filter input. 它还演示了 方法。It also demonstrates the method. 这是一个完整的示例;一旦将其添加到项目中，就可以运行了。This is a complete example; it is ready to run once you add it to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 或 方法将关键字或提示与指定控件关联时，调用此方法会自动返回 `true` 。When you use the or method to associate a keyword or prompt with a specified control, calling this method automatically returns `true`. 可以通过将传递给方法来重写此行为 `false` 。You can override this behavior by passing `false` to the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定与此 对象关联的帮助文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this object.
The name of the Help file.

value.span: 其形式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。

span.span: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索到的文件名标识文件，该文件为此对象为其提供帮助的所有控件提供帮助支持。The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help. 此文件名可以指定已编译的帮助 ( chm) 文件或原始 HTML 文件。This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示区分上下文的帮助。The following example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用 来设置帮助工具提示文本。The example uses the to set the Help ToolTip text. 使用 "上下文相关帮助" 按钮并单击 "地址" 字段上的 "帮助" 光标时，"帮助" 工具提示会显示指定的文本。When using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 在地址字段中按 F1 键时，将 `mspaint.chm` 显示帮助文件，因为该 属性已设置为 `mspaint.chm` 。When pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the `mspaint.chm` Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 为 每个地址控件调用方法，以确定它具有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks "帮助" 关键字提供了用于从属性所指定的帮助文件中检索与此控件关联的帮助的关键信息 。The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the property. 若要将帮助打开到特定主题，应以 *topicName*格式传递关键字。To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm. 若要清除关键字，请 使用值调用方法 `keyword` `null` 。To clear the keyword, call the method with a `keyword` value of `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果先前 为参数中指定的控件调用了或 `ctl` ，则 会自动显示该控件的帮助。If you previously called the or for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the automatically displays Help for that control. 若要修改此行为，请调用 方法，并 `false` 在 `value` 参数中指定。To modify this behavior, call the method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示区分上下文的帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用 方法来设置帮助工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当你使用上下文相关的 "帮助" 按钮并单击 "地址" 字段上的 "帮助" 光标时，"帮助" 工具提示会显示指定的文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 当你按下 "地址" 字段中的 "F1" 键时，将显示 mspaint.exe 帮助文件，因为该 属性已设置为 `mspaint.chm` 。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 为 每个地址控件调用方法，以确定它具有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
